mapper.select: select count(ITEMBOARD_NO) from itemboard where STORE_NO = (select st.store_no from store st inner join member mb on st.MEMBER_NO = mb.MEMBER_NO where mb.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{ITEMBOARD_email}) and itemboard_delete_b = 0
select * from itemboard ite inner join store st on ite.STORE_NO = st.STORE_NO where st.STORE_NAME=#{store_Name } and ite.ITEMBOARD_DELETE_B = 0 order by ite.ITEMBOARD_NO

select * from itemboard ite inner join store st on ite.STORE_NO = st.STORE_NO inner join MEMBER mem on st.MEMBER_NO=mem.MEMBER_NO where mem.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{ITEMBOARD_email} and ite.ITEMBOARD_DELETE_B = 0 order by ite.ITEMBOARD_NO
select item_price from item where ITEM_NO=#{item_No }
select count(*) from fav where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }
select count(*) from ITEM_QNA where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }
select count(ITEMBOARD_NO) from itemboard where STORE_NO = (select STORE_NO from store where STORE_NAME = #{storeName }) and itemboard_delete_b = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT into item(item_no, item_price, item_state, item_amount, item_delivery_b, item_delivery_state) values ( (select max(ITEM_NO) from item)+1, #{item_Price }, #{item_State }, #{item_Amount }, #{item_Delivery_B }, 1 )

INSERT into itemboard (sub_no, itemboard_date, itemboard_local, itemboard_title, itemboard_contents, itemboard_viewcount, itemboard_recommend_b, itemboard_change_b, item_no, itemboard_no, store_no, itemboard_delete_b) values( #{sub_No}, sysdate, #{itemboard_Local }, #{itemboard_Title }, #{itemboard_Contents }, 0, 0, #{itemboard_Change_b }, (select max(ITEM_NO) from item), (select max(itemboard_no) from itemboard)+1, (select st.store_no from member mb inner join store st on mb.member_no = st.MEMBER_NO where mb.member_email = #{member_email }), 0 )
insert into tag (tag_no, TAG_NAME, itemboard_no) values((select max(TAG_NO) from tag)+1,#{tag }, (select max(ITEMBOARD_NO) from ITEMBOARD))
mapper.update: UPDATE itemboard set ITEMBOARD_DELETE_B = 1 where ITEMBOARD_NO = #{itemboard_No }
mapper.select: select * from ITEM it inner join ITEMBOARD ib on it.ITEM_NO=ib.ITEM_NO inner join tag ta on ta.ITEMBOARD_NO = ib.ITEMBOARD_NO inner join CATEGORY_SUB cs on cs.SUB_NO = ib.SUB_NO where ib.ITEMBOARD_NO =#{itemboard_No }
